infotexts.jobdescription.blueshield: Dedicated to safeguarding ship captains and crew with unwavering commitment and expertise. A trusted guardian of maritime security.
infotexts.talentdescription.codegamma: Deal [amount]% more damage with ‖color:gui.orange‖Revolvers‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Handcannons‖end‖ to foes.
infotexts.talentdescription.nobodydies: Medical items you apply are +[amount]% more potent.
infotexts.talentdescription.apocalypsehorseman: Inflict [amount]% more damage for every nearby enemy. Up to [maxamount]%.
